::Battera::

She looked around and saw no bots near the ship.  She walked a little 
closer. She kept checking the area for bots but saw none.  She used 
her sonar and discovered a bot in the area.  She was hoping it was 
maximal.  She checked her scanner but it didn't register what the bot 
was. "Oh blast it all." she spoke aloud to herself.  She took out a 
small screw driver from her leg panel and worked on her scanner.  
After working on it a bit, she checked again.  Her scanner was still 
messing up. " Oh, of all the times to have a malfunction."  she was 
mad at herself for letting this happen at such a crushal time.
SHe knew there was another bot out there, but before she wanted to 
talk to it, she had to make sure it was Maximal first.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Wolveritron::
> 
>     He didn't here a reply from the bot that had insulted him. He 
looked 
> around the Maximal Base and began scanning for any signals that 
were not 
> Maximal. He found one. He started to walk towards it, then thinking 
about it 
> he retracted his claws as to make it think he was going to help.
> 
> (He's going after Battera)
